imdb.plot outline: How To with Kitty Gibbs is a mockumentary of a slightly neurotic woman who explores her new found importance of bringing friends and family together. Now recently divorced, she is starting her own online show of a woman who specializes in entertaining for guests. We follow Kitty and explore her relationships with her guests as well as her advice for throwing a party. She does not quite have it as together as she believes she does.
imdb.title: How to with Kitty Gibbs
akas: How to with Kitty Gibbs (United States)
